meanings.sent1: The striated pattern on the fabric was very noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The zebra's striated coat helped it blend into the tall grass.
meanings.sent3: The striated clouds in the sky looked like giant brush strokes.
meanings.sent4: Her striated hair shone like a river of silver in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The striated bark of the tree felt rough to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The striated design on the wall gave it a modern look.
meanings.sent2: The striated road markings helped guide the drivers safely.
meanings.sent3: The striated cake frosting made it look like a delicious maze.
meanings.sent4: The striated sand dunes stretched endlessly into the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The striated rock formations resembled layers of colorful history.
